subsection.name: Q 1.1 Where do I get help with Cayenne?
subsection.p: Free Cayenne support is provided by its authors and Cayenne user community via cayenne-user mailing list. For details how to subscribe and for earlier archives, go to http://objectstyle.org/cayenne/lists.html.

subsection.name: Q 1.2 How do I report a bug that I found in Cayenne?
subsection.p: Cayenne is using SourceForge bug tracking system. Go to http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=48132&atid=452068 to submit Cayenne-related bugs. Reporting bugs is the most valuable contribution Cayenne users can provide for the development team.

subsection.name: Q 1.3 How does Cayenne compare to XYZ O/R tool?
subsection.p: There is a growing Wiki page at http://c2.com/cgi-bin/wiki?ObjectRelationalToolComparison originally started by Cayenne team. Please go there for such information, and to participate in building the comparison.

subsection.name: Q 1.4 What License covers Cayenne source?
subsection.p: This is a recast Apache (or BSD) license. In short - source code is avaliable, modifications are allowed, modifications and products built with Cayenne can be distributed unrestricted. The only requirement - give Cayenne authors a written credit when using Cayenne in a derivative work.
